body:
Alrighty, so I'll make this clean and simple then. 

Goodbye and thankyou. 

Working at the avicus network has been one hell of an experience in itself and has taught me many lessons about leading a team of people, managing a community of people from around the globe, but more importantly has taught me more about myself then most girls or guys would ever experience, at my age anyways. 

I've decided not to give shout outs to people who particularly have influenced and changed me as a person as for one, there will likely be way too many, second, many will be left out, and third, as of late many of the relationships established since I worked as director of staff have since diminished.

Feel free to ask any questions below if you're into that sort of thing, I will be both very truthful and unfeigned about each of my answers, something which definitely hasn't been shared among most of the current staff team. I also reach out to those new staff members who look for guidance or advice, I am more than welcome to accommodate. 

So, er, yeah, its been great, but as likely said by some old guy hundreds of years ago, 'Good things always come to an end.'

replies.body:
Girl* 


Good bye Howsie, you were a HUGE influence on Avicus and always will be. I am lost for words as this may be the biggest leave in Avicus history. Fare well in life and even though I didn't know you much, you seemed to be a great person. you were always here through the good and the bad times, managing the forums, keeping the chat clean and generally just making sure people were enjoying themselves. You will be so, so missed and always remember you have stamped your place into the Avicus "Hall of Fame". Good bye one more time and good luck in life <3

replies.body:
Wow... Well Howsie, I just want to say a couple of things. Firstly, thank you for everything. For allowing me the chance to be Senior Mod, for being a great person to talk to, for your kind attitude... I couldn't think of a better person to take on the role which you did. 

Secondly, good luck in life. I'm glad you've decided to move on from Avicus and I'm certain life will reward you greatly for that. Whatever you choose to end up doing in your life I believe in you and wish you all the very best of luck. When I return to Skype if ever you want someone to talk to, I would be more than happy to.

Adios friend <3

reply_to.body:
Girl* 


Good bye Howsie, you were a HUGE influence on Avicus and always will be. I am lost for words as this may be the biggest leave in Avicus history. Fare well in life and even though I didn't know you much, you seemed to be a great person. you were always here through the good and the bad times, managing the forums, keeping the chat clean and generally just making sure people were enjoying themselves. You will be so, so missed and always remember you have stamped your place into the Avicus "Hall of Fame". Good bye one more time and good luck in life <3

reply_to.body:
Wow... Well Howsie, I just want to say a couple of things. Firstly, thank you for everything. For allowing me the chance to be Senior Mod, for being a great person to talk to, for your kind attitude... I couldn't think of a better person to take on the role which you did. 

Secondly, good luck in life. I'm glad you've decided to move on from Avicus and I'm certain life will reward you greatly for that. Whatever you choose to end up doing in your life I believe in you and wish you all the very best of luck. When I return to Skype if ever you want someone to talk to, I would be more than happy to.

Adios friend <3
reply_to.body_tagged:
Wow... Well Howsie, I just want to say a couple of things. Firstly, thank you for everything. For allowing me the chance to be Senior Mod, for being a great person to talk to, for your kind attitude... I couldn't think of a better person to take on the role which you did. 

Secondly, good luck in life. I'm glad you've decided to move on from Avicus and I'm certain life will reward you greatly for that. Whatever you choose to end up doing in your life I believe in you and wish you all the very best of luck. When I return to Skype if ever you want someone to talk to, I would be more than happy to.

Adios friend <3

replies.body:
Howsie , out of all my time i spent on Avicus you were always there day and night.despite having one of the hardest jobs on avicus you put together such an amazing staff team who were filled with joy ,happiness and just all round great people.

Without you the Avicus community wouldn't be as loving and caring as it has been over the course of my time here.I would just like to personally thank you for everything you've contributed Avicus.

replies.body:
It is only an illegal bump if the comment in question was off-topic, regardless of how long ago the previous comment was.

I don't understand how you came to the conclusion that an on-topic comment that related to the OP was an "illegal bump".

Also, being a Moderator is not (and has never been) my intention when I try to help others.
